availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Frederick Martin Baringer (Jefferson County, Kentucky, gardener)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, gardener. Kentucky native. Son of John Jacob Baringer and Catherine Baringer. Married to Catharine Baessler Baringer in 1847. Father of John Baringer, Caroline Baringer, Ella Rebecca Baringer Rammers, William F. Baringer, and Mary Ann Baringer Stilz. Married to Sophia Edinger Baringer on August 25, 1859 in Louisville, Kentucky. Father of Lydia C. Baringer. Farmer in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Gardner in Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 1, p. 174B.
